message.raw:
Add a CMake parameter for building messages and services only.

By passing the variable BUILD_MSGS_ONLY to the catkin build line
(as in "catkin_make -DBUILD_MSGS_ONLY=true install"), the build
will only generate the code for the messages and services.  This
allows teams to build the messages without installing all of the
dependencies for the rest of SRCSIM.
message.html:
